resources.string: In this game, you are given topics to re-enact to the other person via live video feed. The oldest gets to start. The other player will guess by inputting a guess. The guess will be sent back to you translated to whatever language you chose. If that player guessed correctly, let them know via chat. Let the other person act out the same topic, but this time, you have to guess. If both of you were able to guess what each of you were acting out, go to the next topic. There is a progress bar in which it will let you know how many you have guessed. Once it is filled. the game is over.

string-array.name: animalTopics
string-array.item: What type of pet do you have?
What is your favorite animal?
What is your least favorite animal?
What animal do you think you relate to?
What type of pet would you want to have?

string-array.name: feelingTopics
string-array.item: What are you scared of?
What activity makes you happy?
What are you excited about for the upcoming week?
What fictional place would you most like to go?
What job do you think would you be terrible at?
What is something that irks you?
What is the most boring activity you can think of?
What type of food do you like? (Spicy, sour etc)

string-array.name: goalTopics
string-array.item: What did you want to be when you grow up?
What will be your New Yearâ€™s resolution?
If you were to learn a new skill, what would it be?
What is something you need to improve on?
What kind of sports do you wish you were good at?
What superpower would you want to have?
What is something you do to destress yourself?

string-array.name: movieTopics
string-array.item: What is your favorite type of movie?
What is your least favorite type of movie?
What was the last movie you watched in theaters?

string-array.name: familyTopics
string-array.item: Who is your least favorite person in your family?
Who is someone you look up to in your family?
What are you studying in college?
What is your talent?

resources.string: Tap "Connect" to start live video feed to act out the questions.
Tapping this will disconnect you from the other player.
Here is the log. The first entry in the response translated in the language we chose. The bottom one is the original message sent from the other player.
After you start, you must pick a category. Both players must have the same category.
